description:
Chihiro and Mero`s late mother, who died prior to the series. It`s hinted that after a fatal car accident she was revived as a zombie for a short while, most likely by Grandfather Jogorou. Such as in Mero`s flashbacks where her mother has bandaged hands and remarks she can`t tell Mero`s temperature from her forehead with her hand anymore.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Furuya Yuzuna
